tabs.title: Navigation Tabs
tabs.description: Use these tabs to switch between different tools. Each tab has specialized functionality for tournament judging.

theme.title: Theme Toggle
theme.description: Switch between light and dark mode to match your preference or lighting conditions.

language.title: Language Selection
language.description: Choose your preferred language. The app supports English, Portuguese, and Spanish.

draw.title: Draw Checkbox
draw.description: Mark when a player draws a card at the start of their turn. Tap anywhere on this card to toggle.

actions.title: Action Buttons
actions.description: Track game actions: Supporter, Energy, Stadium, Retreat, and Other. Once-per-turn actions turn green when used. Tap the red minus to undo.

prizes.title: Prizes Counter
prizes.description: Track how many prize cards have been taken this turn.

timerDisplay.title: Timer & Pace
timerDisplay.description: Monitor turn duration and calculate the pace (seconds per action).

timerControls.title: Timer Controls
timerControls.description: Start and stop the turn timer. The timer helps track player pace during a match.

nextTurn.title: Next Turn
nextTurn.description: End the current turn and start tracking the next player. All counters reset automatically.

turnHistory.title: Turn History
turnHistory.description: View a complete record of all turns, showing actions, time, and pace for each player.

clearAll.title: Clear All
clearAll.description: Reset all data including turn history. A confirmation dialog will appear first.

autostart.title: Autostart Options
autostart.description: Configure automatic timer start when checking Draw or pressing Next Turn.

counters.title: Card Counters
counters.description: Count cards by type: Pokemon, Trainer, and Energy. Tap +1 through +4 to add multiple cards at once.

deckTotal.title: Total Counter
deckTotal.description: Shows the total card count. Turns green at exactly 60 cards, red otherwise.

deckControls.title: Undo & Reset
deckControls.description: Undo the last count or reset all counters to zero.

lookupCard.title: Card Lookup
lookupCard.description: Opens the official Pokemon card database to verify card information.

roundName.title: Round Name
roundName.description: Enter the round name (e.g., 'Round 1', 'Finals') to display on the timer.

roundTimerDisplay.title: Timer Display
roundTimerDisplay.description: Shows remaining time. Green when more than 1/3 remaining, yellow under 1/3, red when overtime.

presets.title: Quick Presets
presets.description: Set common round times: BO1 (30min), BO3 (50min), or Top Cut (75min).

roundControls.title: Timer Controls
roundControls.description: Start, pause, or reset the round timer.

startDisplay.title: Full Screen Display
startDisplay.description: Open the timer in a new full-screen window for all players to see.

extensionForm.title: Add Extension
extensionForm.description: Record time extensions by entering the round number, table, and minutes granted.

extensionTable.title: Extensions List
extensionTable.description: View all recorded extensions grouped by round. Edit or delete entries as needed.

documents.title: Official Documents
documents.description: Quick access to official Pokemon TCG tournament rules, penalty guidelines, and reference materials.

tableJudge.title: Table Judge
tableJudge.confirmClearMessage: Are you sure you want to clear all data including turn history?

credits.title: Credits
credits.description: Special thanks to everyone who helped make this project possible.
